column1: #Text=Korra says : " I know that Earth Queen is lying to me !
#Text=You letting off steam is starting to , hurt .
#Text=" Asami says : " Can you interpret that ?
#Text=" Mako says : " The Earth Queen 's been secretly taking away airbenders and forcing them into her army .
#Text=I swear , the next time I see her - " Asami says : " It 's the Queen .
#Text=" Gun says : " We 've received word from the Yang Province .
#Text=There have been reports of airbenders there .
#Text=" Hou - Ting says : " Wonderful , is n't it ?
#Text=It 's the very thing you 've been looking for .
#Text=That is just the most wonderful news .
#Text=" Hou - Ting says : " So , I assume you and your friends here will be leaving immediately .
#Text=Is there an animal in my presence ?
#Text=" Gun says : " N - no , Your Majesty .
#Text=I would never allow an animal near you .
#Text=" Hou - Ting says : " If I find one within fifty feet of me , it 's your head .
#Text=Anyway , if you need any assistance packing , let Gun know .
#Text=He 'll see to it that you 're on your way by evening .
#Text=I 'm not sure about leaving so soon - " Asami says : " Because our airship is having engine trouble .
#Text=It 'll take me until tomorrow to finish the repairs .
#Text=" Korra says : " Thanks for buying us some time .
